item.title: Launi add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Launi add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Launi add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Launi add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Launi add a quote by Muriel Spark
item.description: "To me education is a leading out of what is already there in the pupil's soul." -- Muriel Spark

item.title: Launi add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Launi add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Even if you are on the right track, youâ€™ll get run over if you just sit there." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Launi add a quote by Nadine Gordimer
item.description: "The truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is." -- Nadine Gordimer

item.title: Launi add a quote by Abigail Van Buren
item.description: "The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back." -- Abigail Van Buren

item.title: Launi add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Launi add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "The air was soft, the stars so fine, the promise of every cobbled alley so great, that I thought I was in a dream." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Launi add a quote by Henry Murger
item.description: "The first duty of wine is to be red. Don't talk to me of your white wines." -- Henry Murger

item.title: Launi add a quote by Vikram Seth
item.description: "God save us from people who mean well." -- Vikram Seth
